answers.answer: All doctors are different. My doctor told me I could eat but it couldn't be nothing sugary. Other doctors suggest their patients to be fasting. Give them a call as soon as you wake up to meke sure.
My doctor didn't tell me to fast but the place that did my blood work told me 6 hours of fasting
Yea fast, i just did this. Dont eat anything at least 2 hrs before going to bed or you will get a high result..
My doc told me nothing after midnight the day before.

question: I need help I am suppose to go get my gestational diabetes test tomorrow do I need to fast the day of???
